name: e2e-tests
description: End to end tests for the Aselo HRM

scripts.test:local: cross-env DEBUG=pw:api LOAD_SSM_CONFIG=true npm run test
scripts.test:development:as: cross-env DEBUG=pw:api LOAD_SSM_CONFIG=true HL_ENV=development HL=as SKIP_DATA_UPDATE=true npm run test
scripts.test:development:e2e: cross-env DEBUG=pw:api LOAD_SSM_CONFIG=true HL_ENV=development HL=e2e npm run test
scripts.test:development:e2e:local: cross-env LOAD_SSM_CONFIG=true HL_ENV=development HL=e2e npm run test -- --headed
scripts.test:development:e2e:debug: cross-env DEBUG=pw:api LOAD_SSM_CONFIG=true HL_ENV=development HL=e2e npm run test -- --headed --retries 0 webchat
scripts.test:staging:ca: cross-env DEBUG=pw:api LOAD_SSM_CONFIG=true HL_ENV=staging HL=ca npm run test
scripts.test:staging:ca:headed: LOAD_SSM_CONFIG=true HL_ENV=staging HL=ca SKIP_DATA_UPDATE=true PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSER_TELEMETRY_LEVEL=none npm test -- --headed
scripts.test:production:ca: cross-env DEBUG=pw:api LOAD_SSM_CONFIG=true HL_ENV=production HL=ca npm run test
scripts.docker:run: docker run -it --rm --read-only --tmpfs /tmp:exec -e DEBUG=pw:browser -e AWS_DEFAULT_REGION -e AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY -e AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID -e LOAD_SSM_CONFIG=true -e HL_ENV=development -e HL=e2e -e TEST_IN_LAMBDA=true -e AWS_LAMBDA_FUNCTION_TIMEOUT=900 -p 9000:8080 e2e-test
scripts.docker:run:writable: docker run -it --rm --tmpfs /tmp -e AWS_DEFAULT_REGION -e AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY -e AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID -e LOAD_SSM_CONFIG=true -e HL_ENV=development -e HL=e2e -e TEST_IN_LAMBDA=true -e AWS_LAMBDA_FUNCTION_TIMEOUT=900 -p 9000:8080 e2e-test
scripts.docker:push: npm run docker:push:login && npm run docker:push:tag && npm run docker:push:push
scripts.docker:push:login: aws ecr get-login-password --region us-east-1 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin 712893914485.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com
